name: Single filer at median income
description: Median professional earner at €50,000 in Spain

sources.description: Calculated using 2026 Spanish national IRPF rates and Social Security contributions
sources.notes: IRPF: 19%/24%/30%/37% brackets. Personal allowance €5,550. SS: 6.50%. Max SS base: €61,214.40. Income below SS max so no solidarity contribution.
